hero.heading:
No Hesi 
No Exceptions 
Pure Adrenaline
hero.subheading: Bringing you the underground Street racing scene like no other community.

section2.heading: What we do
section2.desc: No Hesi is a tribute to the rebels of the road. We're capturing the thrill of street racing and embedding it into the heart of our gaming experience. Through a seamless fusion of street culture and sim racing, we're breaking boundaries and setting the pace in the world of virtual driving.

home.title: Statistics
home.statsMsg: To view your Steam profile statistics, you must first connect your Steam account.

friends.title: Friends
friends.buyMsg: Buy VIP to Access this server

basicInfo.title: Basic Information
basicInfo.modalText1: We sent you a six digit confirmation code to {email}. Please enter it below to confirm your email adress.

other.title: Other Settings
other.warning: Warning! This action cannot be cancelled!
other.modalWarning: Warning! This action cannot be cancelled!
other.modalMsg1: We're sorry you want to deactivate your account. Please write a reason why you want to deactivate below
other.modalMsg2: Enter your username to confirm your action.

left.heading:
Questions? 
No problem, 
we have the answer

features.heading:
No Hesi is a 
Global Community

f1.heading: WORLDWIDE INFLUENCE
f1.desc: Our content has billions of views, and has created an entirely new community of driving enthusiasts. We have over a 100K active members that drive together across all continents.

f2.heading: OUR VISION
f2.desc: Since the beginning, our vision has been to blend the real and virtual world, aligning our brand with the underground racing community. We partner with real-world brands to get you as close as possible to your dream builds with the most desirable cars in the world.

f3.heading: UNLIMITED POTENTIAL
f3.desc: As the leading virtual car community, you have an opportunity to grow your own brand and following with hundreds of thousands of drivers across the globe. Create new connections that you can't make anywhere else.

plans.heading: Choose your lane
plans.desc: Enhance your No Hesi experience with VIP
planFeatures: Access to Help and Help FAQ
JDM, VTEC, Manual and Drag Servers

signup.title: Sign up
signup.msg1: By clicking "Create account" above, you acknowledge that you will receive updates from the No Hesi team and that you have read, understood, and agreed to No Hesi's

forgetPassword.title:
FORGOT YOUR 
PASSWORD?
forgetPassword.msg1: Enter your email address below and we'll send you a code to log in and reset your password.
forgetPassword.label: Email

verifyEmail.title: Verify your email
verifyEmail.msg1: We've sent you a six digit confirmation code to example@mail.com. Please enter it below to confirm your email adress.
verifyEmail.msg4: A new code was sent - check your inbox

connectDiscord.title:
CONNECT YOUR 
DISCORD
connectDiscord.msg: Link your Discord account for proper leaderboard integration, role allocation, and community support. This is a required step to access all server functionalities and support services.
